entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:57 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, 18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 08:48 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Haze
Temperature: 18.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 28 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 28

entry.title: Monday: Smoke. High 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Widespread smoke. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Smoke. Low 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Widespread smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Widespread smoke. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016
